name: asm-dom
description: A virtual dom in web assembly

scripts.compile: mkdir -p compiled && npm run compile:cpp && npm run compile:asmjs && npm run compile:wasm
scripts.compile:asmjs: mkdir -p compiled/asmjs && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --closure 1 --pre-js src/helpers/prefix.js --post-js src/helpers/postfix.js -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=[] -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 compiled/asm-dom.bc -o compiled/asmjs/asm-dom.asm.js
scripts.compile:wasm: mkdir -p compiled/wasm && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --pre-js src/helpers/prefix.js --post-js src/helpers/postfix.js -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=[] -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 -s BINARYEN=1 compiled/asm-dom.bc -o compiled/wasm/asm-dom.js
scripts.test: npm run compile && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs nyc --require babel-register --require ./test/setup.js mocha --recursive
scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/helpers
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore src/helpers
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/asm-dom.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/asm-dom.min.js
scripts.build:compile: npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build

author: Matteo Basso (https://github.com/mbasso)
